text: Richard Bowman Myers (born 1 March 1942) is a retired United States Air Force general. He was the 15th chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff from 2001 until 2005. He was the 14th president of Kansas State University from 2016 to 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kansas State University profile * * Myers on Eyes on the Horizon: Serving on the Front Lines of National Security at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library on July 15, 2010 * Senate Armed Services Committee Inquiry into the Treatment of Cetainees I'm U.S. Custody, United States Senate Committee on Armed Services, 2008 * General Richard B. Myers Veterans Biomedical Equipment Technology Program * Medisend College of Biomedical Engineering Technology Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:Chairmen of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Academics from Missouri Category:Military people from Missouri Category:People from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Academics from Kansas Category:Military people from Kansas
title: Richard Myers
